sermons.title: 3 Great Motivations to Love the Lord by Paul Washer
7 Reasons Why The Church In North America Has Lost The Fear Of The Lord by Edgar Reich
A Plain Vision for the Church and Coming Persecution by Brian Long
sermons.description: Brian Long passionately shares on the vital subject of coming persecution to the Church in North America. From the book of Habbukuk he shares how the prophet struggled with coming judgment in his day and we must accept the same in our day. He also gives the solution of the great truth of the true baptism of the Holy Spirit for to reach the lost world and make disciples.  This message is needful to be heard by the whole Church in this hour.
sermons.preacher_description:
SermonIndex.net Simulcast Conference
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons of the SermonIndex.net Simulcast Event 2012 in mp3 format. There has been much prayer and support in the west for those precious saints who suffer for Jesus in restricted and closed nations. Now some choice servants are saying persecution will be coming upon the Church in North America. We are anything but prepared. This simulcast event is geared to warn and help the Church in North America start the process of being ready for persecution.

All speakers have come freely on their own accord not recieving any honorium. The event is 100% free. SermonIndex does not recieve any money from the event. The First Baptist Church is hosting us freely. We believe that this event is an expression of the body of Christ coming together in this critical time. Our desire is simply to see the body of Christ strengthened through this event.

sermons.title: America Has Stopped Praying And Has Lost The Fear Of The Lord by Greg Frizzell
Bristol Conference 1962 - Part 1
sermons.preacher_description:
William MacDonald (1917 - 2007)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker William MacDonald in mp3 format. Was President of Emmaus Bible College, teacher, Plymouth Brethren theologian and a prolific author of over 84 published books. MacDonald refused to accept royalties for his books but established a fund for translating his work Believers Bible Commentary into foreign languages.

   Bill will be not only be remembered for the thousands upon thousands of lives he touched through his books, teaching and many personal letters, but for his Christ-like character and gentleness, yet powerful life lived by faith in Christ. One of his most impact-ful books is the small booklet called: "True Discipleship" it is recommended reading for every serious disciple of Christ.

sermons.title: Cowards And Conquers Of The End-Times Church by Steve Gallagher
sermons.description: Brother Steve Gallagher gives a convicting and true picture of those that will be over-comers in the End-times body of Christ. The culmination of all things is upon us we must be sober and self-controlled with a spirit of victory to follow the Lamb of God that overcame this world system.

sermons.title: Evangelistic Conference 1978 (McMaster University) - Part 1
sermons.preacher_description:
George Verwer (1938 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker George Verwer in mp3 format. Founder of Operation Mobilization an missions organization that sends out full-time and part-time missionaries to many countries in the world. One of the burdens of brother George has been to distribute powerful literature to Christians such as: "The Calvary Road by Roy Hession," and many others. 

George Verwer has written many books including the powerful book: "Come, Live, Die!" He has mobilized and encouraged thousands of Christian workers to fulfill their calling in the Lord to reach the lost world with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

sermons.preacher_description:
William MacDonald (1917 - 2007)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker William MacDonald in mp3 format. Was President of Emmaus Bible College, teacher, Plymouth Brethren theologian and a prolific author of over 84 published books. MacDonald refused to accept royalties for his books but established a fund for translating his work Believers Bible Commentary into foreign languages.

   Bill will be not only be remembered for the thousands upon thousands of lives he touched through his books, teaching and many personal letters, but for his Christ-like character and gentleness, yet powerful life lived by faith in Christ. One of his most impact-ful books is the small booklet called: "True Discipleship" it is recommended reading for every serious disciple of Christ.

sermons.title: Founders Week Conference 1974 - 01
sermons.preacher_description:
Vance Havner (1901 - 1986)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Vance Havner in mp3 format. For over 70 years, the church was blessed and challenged by the prophetic ministry of Vance Havner. His style and burden was prophetic similar to the ministry of A.W. Tozer calling the Church to revival. His influence extended to a national level, but Dr. Havner's approach was always to minister where God directed, regardless of the size of the church.  His appeal and influence transcended denominational lines, and he spoke to many different groups of people.

Throughout his ministry, Vance Havner lived and preached that a Christian should should exhibit faithfulness to Jesus in all areas of life.  He taught that the Christian should attend to, "the outliving of the inliving Christ."  Havner wrote, "To some, Christianity is an argument.  To many, it is a performance.  To a few, it is an experience."

sermons.title: From Religion To New Covenant In The Fear Of The Lord by Mark Case
General Session 1 w/ Pastor Cymbala
sermons.description: Pastor Cymbala opens the Brooklyn Tabernacle 2011 Be Encouraged Conference.
sermons.preacher_description:
Jim Cymbala (1949 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Jim Cymbala in mp3 format. Brother Jim Cymbala was called into ministry without formal training in Brooklyn, New York to pastor a small gathering. God showed him the great need of prayer and depending on the work of the Holy Spirit in the ministry. God blessed and grew the brooklyn tabernacle to a large church of thousands because of this reliance.

The burden of his ministry is to show the vital need for prayer, deependence on God and that God uses the weak and lowly to build His kingdom. He has written many books including the best-selling: "Fresh Wind, Fresh Fire" and his newer book "Spirit Rising" speaking of the neglected work of the Holy Spirit in our churches these days.

sermons.title: General Session 2 w/ Pastor Cymbala
sermons.description: Pastor Cymbala brings a powerful word from the Brooklyn Tabernacle 2011 Be Encouraged Conference.

sermons.title: How To Survive An OM Conference
sermons.preacher_description:
George Verwer (1938 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker George Verwer in mp3 format. Founder of Operation Mobilization an missions organization that sends out full-time and part-time missionaries to many countries in the world. One of the burdens of brother George has been to distribute powerful literature to Christians such as: "The Calvary Road by Roy Hession," and many others. 

George Verwer has written many books including the powerful book: "Come, Live, Die!" He has mobilized and encouraged thousands of Christian workers to fulfill their calling in the Lord to reach the lost world with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

sermons.title: How to Build your Church - Slovakia Conference 2003 (slovakian/english)
sermons.description: The message is about how to build your Church. Pastor Wilkerson shares the importance of building a Cross/Christ-Centered Church. The example he gives is Paul's resolve and determination to preach Christ and Him crucified to the Corinthian church -who are much like our present day Church.. Gary Wilkerson(David's son) also stresses the importance of not going the way of corporate CEO like "pastors" and following after manifestations and various building projects. Its an awesome message that I'd recommend every pastor listen to.

sermons.title: Jacob Generation - Slovakia Conference 2003 (slovakian/english)
sermons.description:
Gary Wilkerson talks about the Jacob Generation, who's one desire is to let Jesus have the Pre-eminense over all things. He preaches from psalms 24, with the key verse 24:6. 

[i]NOTE: First 15 minutes of this message is worship in slovak. And the message is intrepreted to the people in slovak.[/i]

sermons.title: Los Angeles Conference #1
sermons.description: This message was delivered on 03/01/1962.
sermons.preacher_description:
T. Austin Sparks (1888 â€“ 1971)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker T. Austin Sparks in mp3 format. He was ordained as a Baptist pastor at the age of 24, and from 1912 to 1926 led three congregations in Greater London. During these years, he was also closely related to Jessie Penn-Lewis and her publication and speaking ministry, the "Overcomer Testimony."

Among the many books that he wrote, at least three are regarded as Christian classics: The School of Christ, The Centrality and Supremacy of the Lord Jesus Christ and We Beheld His Glory. The primary theme of Sparks' books is the exaltation of the Lord Jesus Christ. He mentored Watchman Nee for many years and was very influential in his understanding of the Church Life.

sermons.title: Missions Conference - Part 1
sermons.preacher_description:
Paris Reidhead (1919 - 1992)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Paris Reidhead in mp3 format. Was a Christian missionary, teacher, writer, and advocate of economic development in impoverished nations. A spiritual crisis during this period—as he described two decades later in what is probably his best-known recorded teaching, "Ten Shekels and a Shirt"--left Reidhead with the conviction that much of evangelicalism had adopted utilitarian and humanistic philosophies contradictory to Biblical teaching. The end of all being, he came to believe, was not the happiness of man, but the glorification of God. This theme would recur throughout his later teaching.

Since Mr. Reidhead's death in 1992, Bible Teaching Ministries, Inc. continues under the leadership of his wife, Marjorie, and daughter, Virginia Teitt, a dedicated Board, and the many people who have donated time and talent after being changed by God’s Word through this message. The message of the Gospel is reaching an ever-widening audience all over the world.

sermons.title: The Church Has Lost The Fear Of The Lord Video
The Church and The End Times Apostasy by Steve Gallagher
sermons.description: Brother Steve Gallagher shares on the great need to recognize that there is apostasy in the church in North America and that this will culminate in the rule of antichrist and a babylon church formed which will deceive many. He calls for us to deny ourselves, suffer and follow Christ in the narrow way of discipleship. A powerful and sobering message.
sermons.preacher_description:
SermonIndex.net Simulcast Conference
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons of the SermonIndex.net Simulcast Event 2012 in mp3 format. There has been much prayer and support in the west for those precious saints who suffer for Jesus in restricted and closed nations. Now some choice servants are saying persecution will be coming upon the Church in North America. We are anything but prepared. This simulcast event is geared to warn and help the Church in North America start the process of being ready for persecution.

All speakers have come freely on their own accord not recieving any honorium. The event is 100% free. SermonIndex does not recieve any money from the event. The First Baptist Church is hosting us freely. We believe that this event is an expression of the body of Christ coming together in this critical time. Our desire is simply to see the body of Christ strengthened through this event.

sermons.title: The Fear Of The Lord: Malachi's Resurgence by David Ravenhill
sermons.description: Here we are confronted by one of America’s foremost, modern, “prophets” as he deals with several of church’s most fundamental truths: the fear of God, and the Holy Spirit—and we find his message greeted largely with silence. He crosses all denominational lines, and spares no one. Yet, when he is finished, and we look at ourselves and the North American church one cannot but wonder what will become of us if, as the brother points out, the church doesn’t get its act together. Can we really hope to survive, as a nation and as a people, if we continue to prefer our denominational dogmas, in the place of Scripture? The ramifications of this sermon are devastating.

sermons.title: The Fear of the Lord: The Great Essential for Godliness by Al Whittinghill
The Fourth Tabernacle (Birmingham Conference)
sermons.preacher_description:
David Wilkerson (1931 – 2011)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker David Wilkerson in mp3 format. Founder of Times Square Church in New York City with over 100 different languages spoken in the congregation. Wilkerson wrote many powerful books such as: The Vision and Cross and the Switchblade. His ministry was prophetic as God called him to be a watchman to the Church in North America. He gave clear messages on repentance to the Church. 

Wilkerson also founded Teen Challenge where there are hundreds of centres for Christ-centered drug recovery and addiction recovery. He also organized and spoke at pastors gatherings in many countries where he gave prophetic strong messages to encourage pastors and leaders.

sermons.title: The House Church Movement In China by E.A. Johnston
sermons.description: E.A. Johnston shares the historical background of the influence of Christianity in China and he shares the formation of the current house church movement. Then there are some very powerful warnings and principles that are shared from the Underground House Church Movement in China.

The First Baptist Church is hosting us freely. We believe that this event is an expression of the body of Christ coming together in this critical time. Our desire is simply to see the body of Christ strengthened through this event.

sermons.title: The Power Of The Spirit In The Early Church by Sandeep Poonen
sermons.description: Brother Sandeep Poonen shares on New Covenant Christianity, the freedom in this covenant and the difference between keeping rules and regulations. He moves on to speak of how the work and ministry of the Holy Spirit was in the early church and spoke of persecution and the need for boldness with the power of the Holy Spirit.
sermons.preacher_description:
SermonIndex.net Simulcast Conference
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons of the SermonIndex.net Simulcast Event 2012 in mp3 format. There has been much prayer and support in the west for those precious saints who suffer for Jesus in restricted and closed nations. Now some choice servants are saying persecution will be coming upon the Church in North America. We are anything but prepared. This simulcast event is geared to warn and help the Church in North America start the process of being ready for persecution.

All speakers have come freely on their own accord not recieving any honorium. The event is 100% free. SermonIndex does not recieve any money from the event. The First Baptist Church is hosting us freely. We believe that this event is an expression of the body of Christ coming together in this critical time. Our desire is simply to see the body of Christ strengthened through this event.

sermons.title: The Snare of the Deliver - Slovakia Conference 2003 (slovakian/english)
sermons.description:
Gary Wilkerson preaches from Judges 8. Sampson cherised one small thing in his heart and it was a snare to himself and his family. What is your snare?

[i]NOTE: First 5 minutes of this message is worship in slovak. And the message is intrepreted to the people in slovak.[/i]

sermons.title: The Touch Of God (Birmingham Conference)
sermons.preacher_description:
David Wilkerson (1931 – 2011)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker David Wilkerson in mp3 format. Founder of Times Square Church in New York City with over 100 different languages spoken in the congregation. Wilkerson wrote many powerful books such as: The Vision and Cross and the Switchblade. His ministry was prophetic as God called him to be a watchman to the Church in North America. He gave clear messages on repentance to the Church. 

Wilkerson also founded Teen Challenge where there are hundreds of centres for Christ-centered drug recovery and addiction recovery. He also organized and spoke at pastors gatherings in many countries where he gave prophetic strong messages to encourage pastors and leaders.

sermons.title: The War With the Most Casualties: The War Between The Saints by Keith Daniel
Wabanna 1966: Title Unknown 1
sermons.description: Atlantic States Christian Convocation (Wabanna) 1966
sermons.preacher_description:
T. Austin Sparks (1888 â€“ 1971)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker T. Austin Sparks in mp3 format. He was ordained as a Baptist pastor at the age of 24, and from 1912 to 1926 led three congregations in Greater London. During these years, he was also closely related to Jessie Penn-Lewis and her publication and speaking ministry, the "Overcomer Testimony."

Among the many books that he wrote, at least three are regarded as Christian classics: The School of Christ, The Centrality and Supremacy of the Lord Jesus Christ and We Beheld His Glory. The primary theme of Sparks' books is the exaltation of the Lord Jesus Christ. He mentored Watchman Nee for many years and was very influential in his understanding of the Church Life.

sermons.title: Women's Week Union Life at Hixton 1981
World Salt Conference
sermons.preacher_description:
Paris Reidhead (1919 - 1992)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Paris Reidhead in mp3 format. Was a Christian missionary, teacher, writer, and advocate of economic development in impoverished nations. A spiritual crisis during this period—as he described two decades later in what is probably his best-known recorded teaching, "Ten Shekels and a Shirt"--left Reidhead with the conviction that much of evangelicalism had adopted utilitarian and humanistic philosophies contradictory to Biblical teaching. The end of all being, he came to believe, was not the happiness of man, but the glorification of God. This theme would recur throughout his later teaching.

Since Mr. Reidhead's death in 1992, Bible Teaching Ministries, Inc. continues under the leadership of his wife, Marjorie, and daughter, Virginia Teitt, a dedicated Board, and the many people who have donated time and talent after being changed by God’s Word through this message. The message of the Gospel is reaching an ever-widening audience all over the world.

sermons.title: Yosemite Bible Conference 1991-14
sermons.preacher_description:
William MacDonald (1917 - 2007)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker William MacDonald in mp3 format. Was President of Emmaus Bible College, teacher, Plymouth Brethren theologian and a prolific author of over 84 published books. MacDonald refused to accept royalties for his books but established a fund for translating his work Believers Bible Commentary into foreign languages.

   Bill will be not only be remembered for the thousands upon thousands of lives he touched through his books, teaching and many personal letters, but for his Christ-like character and gentleness, yet powerful life lived by faith in Christ. One of his most impact-ful books is the small booklet called: "True Discipleship" it is recommended reading for every serious disciple of Christ.

sermons.title: Yosemite Bible Conference 1991-15 Psalm 8:1

sermons.title: reGeneration Conference Part 1
sermons.preacher_description:
Paul Washer (1961 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Paul Washer in mp3 format. Brother Washer is the founder of Heart Cry Missionary society that funds and supports indigenous missionaries all across the world. He served as a missionary personally in Peru for many years. He has a passion for the glory of God and the preaching of the Gospel of Jesus Christ.

Well-known on the internet for the audio and video message: "Shocking Message to Youth" he has been an in-demand speaker for many conventions and gatherings. He has recently published a new book: "The Gospel's Power and Message" that is highly recommended by many.
